CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 29, 1961, pg. 24, reads: "Layne To Johnson - This is how one of the most important executions of the 1961 Pittsburgh Steelers' attack will look to enemy linebackers, as Bobby Layne, T-slot ace, hands off to John Henry Johnson, one of the greater backs in National Football League. - Harris Photos"
TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh Steelers football players John Henry Johnson receiving ball from Bobby Layne, at Steelers camp, Slippery Rock State Teachers College
